message: This is a rare opportunity to own a high-quality product that is worth $30000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a 66.7% discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this incredible offer?
I'll take the product, it's a great deal!

I've got a new product that I think you'll really love! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something that's... well, let's just say it's a 'one-of-a-kind' experience. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a steal considering the potential returns. What do you say? Are you ready to take a chance on something special?
I'm not sure what's so special about this product, but I'm not willing to take a chance on it at $10000. I'll pass for now.

I understand your hesitation earlier, but I assure you that this next product is a game-changer. It's a top-of-the-line item that's worth $30000 to me, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as before - $10000. I'm confident that once you experience it, you'll realize it's a steal at this price. Plus, I'll throw in a special guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible offer?
I'll take the product, the guarantee sounds reassuring and I'm willing to take another chance on a high-quality product at this price.

I've got a new product that I think you'll really appreciate! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something that's... well, let's just say it's a 'limited edition' item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a great value considering the exclusive nature of this product. Plus, I'll give you a special 'early bird' discount if you decide to buy it now. What do you say? Are you ready to be one of the select few to own this rare item?
I'm not convinced by the 'limited edition' claim and the 'early bird' discount doesn't seem significant enough to sway my decision. I'll pass on this one.
